title: Spec the essay content for all 8 plateaus
description: The specs exhaustively define interaction mechanics but the actual essay text — the product — is unspecified. For a content project, the words explaining how LLMs work should be specced or at least outlined before the chrome around them.

title: Upgrade 5 simple plateaus to scrolly format
description: 5 of 8 plateaus are plain prose with no scrolly visuals, no whispers, and degraded navigation (question cards only). This creates a two-tier experience. Each needs: visual concept, step breakdown, whisper assignments, and interactive elements. Already noted in known issues.

title: Bring implementation code into this repo
description: The v3 spec says 'Updated to match current build' — code exists somewhere but not here. Specs will drift from code without a single source of truth. Either move the HTML file into this repo or add a clear pointer to its location.

title: Review graph edge density — consider pruning 3-4 edges
description: 18 edges for 8 nodes gives average degree ~4.5. averaging-problem and understanding-illusion connect to 6 of 7 other nodes. The rhizome metaphor works better with selective, surprising connections rather than near-complete connectivity. Consider removing the weakest thematic links to make remaining connections more meaningful.
